thread.title: Rashid

author: Rashid
title: Rashid
text: First,I tried another company online to unlock my Samsung Galaxy S4 phone under Virgin mobile Canada but they could not unlock the phone even after 48 hours.Then they told me that if they cannot unlock your phone, then nobody would be able to do that.However,I decided to give another try and paid 15 dollars to unlock code shop and the guys sent me the code within 24 hours.I entered the code and my phone is now working absolutely perfect.I am really impressed with their very affordable rates and excellent customer service.
